meanings.definition: Comedists: Plural form of 'comedian', referring to individuals who perform comedy.
meanings.sent1: The comedists made everyone laugh at the comedy show.
meanings.sent2: The comedists at the club had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent3: The comedists' jokes were so funny that even the grumpiest person cracked a smile.
meanings.sent4: The comedists' humor was a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The comedists' performance was a barrel of laughs from start to finish.

meanings.definition: Comedists: Those who write or create comedic material for performance.
meanings.sent1: The comedists penned hilarious jokes for the comedy show.
meanings.sent2: The comedists brainstormed new skits for the upcoming performance.
meanings.sent3: The comedists' creativity knew no bounds when crafting their comedic sketches.
meanings.sent4: The comedists' wit flowed like a river in their comedic scripts.
meanings.sent5: The comedists' comedic genius shone through in every line they wrote.
